entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:34 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:34 PM CST Friday 03 March 2023
